name: Monstrous
description: Monstrous is a melee combat oriented action adventure game featuring Gothic horror characters entangled in fragile alliances and settling rivalries; played in a free roaming city amidst industrial revolution.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 7850 or GeForce GTX 660 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 3.2 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 7970 or GeForce GTX 770 DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
